Project information

  • Category: Mobile app
  • Client: Me
  • Project URL: mulenga-future.vercel.app

Zed lingo application

This is was my final year project at Copperbelt University. The Zed Lingo application is a mobile app designed to help users learn and practice the Zambian language, nyanja. It features interactive lessons, quizzes, and audio pronunciations to enhance language learning.
